title: Tour news: Halsey, Pulp/Hamilton Leithauser, Rilo Kiley, Darkest Hour, MDC, Bay Swag, more
caption: 🎶 Exciting tour updates! Who's hitting the road? Halsey, Pulp/Hamilton Leithauser, Rilo Kiley, and more ready to rock! 🚌🎸 #MusicNews

title: HighSchool Announce Self-titled Debut Album: Hear “Dipped”
caption: 🎉 HighSchool is serving up some major vibes with their debut album! 🎶 Have you listened to "Dipped" yet? 🔥 #NewMusicAlert

title: Trans-Siberian Orchestra Announce “The Ghosts of Christmas Eve” 2025 Tour
caption: 🎄 Get ready to rock around the Christmas tree! Trans-Siberian Orchestra announces their festive 2025 tour - it's going to be jingle bell rockin'! 🎸🔔 #TSO2025Tour

title: Win Two Weekend Passes to Riot Fest 2025 with Green Day, blink-182, Weezer, and Jack White
caption: 🎉 Ready to rock at Riot Fest 2025? Win two weekend passes to see Green Day, blink-182, Weezer, and Jack White! 🤘 #RiotFest2025 #MusicFestivalFun

title: Lollapalooza Reveals 2026 South American Lineups with Chappell Roan, Sabrina Carpenter, Lorde & Deftones
caption: 🎉 Let's samba with Chappell Roan, groove with Sabrina Carpenter, vibe with Lorde, and rock out with Deftones at Lollapalooza 2026 South America! 🎶 #Lolla2026
